sourcesContent:
Reservas

Fecha de reserva {{element.fechaReserva | date:"dd/MM/YYYY hh:mm"}} Numero de Comensales {{element.comensales}} Menus seleccionados {{element.menu}} Precio total {{element.precio}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { userService } from '../userService'; import { lastValueFrom } from 'rxjs'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Router, UrlSerializer } from '@angular/router'; import { Menu } from '../model/menu'; import { Reserva } from '../model/Reserva'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reservas-personal', templateUrl: './reservas-personal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reservas-personal.component.css'] }) export class ReservasPersonalComponent implements OnInit{ displayedColumns: string[] = ['fechaReserva', 'comensales', 'menus', 'precio']; dataSource :any; menus:string=""; precio:number=0; constructor(private http:HttpClient,private userService: userService,private router: Router){ } async ngOnInit() { if(this.userService.getUser()==null){ this.router.navigate(['/home']) }else{ if(this.userService.getUser().rol=="admin"){ const req=this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/reservas/all'); req.subscribe(aux =>{ this.dataSource=aux; this.cargarDatos() }) }else{ const req=this.http.post('http://localhost:8080/reservas/getReservasID',""+this.userService.getUser().id); req.subscribe(aux =>{ this.dataSource=aux; this.cargarDatos() }) } } } cargarDatos(){ const req=this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/menus/all'); req.subscribe((salida:any) =>{ var aux:Reserva[]= salida this.dataSource.forEach((reserva:any) => { for (let i = 0; i < salida.length; i++) { var element=salida.at(i); if(element.id_menu==reserva.id_menu.at(i)){ this.precio+=(parseInt(element.precio)*parseInt(reserva.cantMenu.at(i))) if(i!=0){ this.menus+=" | "+element.nombre+": "+reserva.cantMenu.at(i); }else{ this.menus+=element.nombre+": "+reserva.cantMenu.at(i); } } } let aux = this.precio+" €" reserva.menu=this.menus reserva.precio=aux this.menus="" this.precio=0 }); }); //var salida:any=await lastValueFrom(req) } }
